channel.title: Minecraft for Xbox
channel.description: Well i just bought Minecraft for my xbox and it is the most boring game to play alone. I am looking for anyone who wants to join me in minecraft explorations/creations. I already have a nice set-up going and just need more people so we can build the world faster. If you would like to join me, add o Java o and i will gladly invite you.

item.title: Minecraft for Xbox
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

Yeah, plus I don’t think you can really play the game like your supposed too with a console controller, you need a good ol’fashion mouse for that

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft for Xbox
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Minecraft xbox worlds never end well, and struggle based on timezone. You’re far better off just playing on your computer.

Read full topic
